data.name: IAccessTokenProviderNotFound
data.value: An instance of IAccessTokenProvider not found for {0}
data.comment: Raised when the call get an access token provider returns null.

data.name: UserAuthorizationNotConfigured
data.value: The AgentApplication.Authorization feature is unavailable because no user Authorization handlers were configured in AgentApplication:UserAuthorization:Handlers.
data.comment: Raised when accessing AgentApplication.Authorization but it hasn't been configured.

data.name: AttributeSelectorNotFound
data.value: The RouteAttribute.Selector method '{0}' is not found.
data.comment: Raised when accessing RouteAttribute is being initialized but the indicated method isn't found on the AgentApplication or subclass.

data.name: AttributeSelectorInvalid
data.value: The RouteAttribute.Selector method '{0}' does not match the RouteSelector delegate definition.
data.comment: Raised when accessing RouteAttribute is being initialized but the indicated Selector method does not have a valid signature.

data.name: UserAuthenticationRequiresAdapter
data.value: AgentApplication.Authorization requires AgentApplicationOptions.Adapter set.
data.comment: Raised when when initializing the AgentApplication.

data.name: StreamingResponseEnded
data.value: StreamingResponse instance has already ended.
data.comment: Raised when when using the instance after it has been ended, or calling EndStream twice.

data.name: TeamsRequiresInformativeFirst
data.value: StreamingResponse in Teams requires QueueInformativeUpdate to be called first.
data.comment: Raised when trying to use QueueTextChunk, but QueueInformativeUpdate has not been called.

data.name: AttributeHandlerInvalid
data.value: The method does not match the RouteHandler delegate definition.
data.comment: Raised when accessing RouteAttribute is being initialized but the indicated method does not have a valid signature.

data.name: AttributeMissingArgs
data.value: A RouteAttribute is missing required arguments.
data.comment: Raised when a RouteAttribute was specified but missing required values.

data.name: UserAuthorizationRequiresAdapter
data.value: AgentApplication.UserAuthorization requires AgentApplicationOptions.Adapter set.
data.comment: Raised when when initializing AgentApplication.

data.name: UserAuthorizationTypeNotFound
data.value: Type '{0}' not found in Assembly '{1}' or is the wrong type for '{2}'.
data.comment: 0 is requested Type, 1 is assembly name, 2 is the type being saught

data.name: UserAuthorizationHandlerNotFound
data.value: Handler name '{0}' not found in configuration under AgentApplication:UserAuthorization:Handlers, or AgentApplication:UserAuthorization:DefaultHandlerName is invalid.
data.comment: Raised when AgentApplication.Authorization requests a handler by name that cannot be found

data.name: FailedToCreateUserAuthorizationHandler
data.value: Failed to create user Authorization provider for handler name '{0}'
data.comment: Raised when a handler is found but the constructor cannot be invoked

data.name: NoUserAuthorizationHandlers
data.value: No UserAuthorization Handlers were defined.
data.comment: Raised when creating the UserAuthorizationDispatcher.

data.name: UserAuthorizationFailed
data.value: Error occurred while trying to authenticate user with '{0}'
data.comment: Raised when a User Authorization was initiated and encountered a critical error.

data.name: UserAuthorizationAlreadyActive
data.value: UserAuthorization sign in for '{0}' is already in progress.
data.comment: Raised when user sign in is already in progress. Only one sign in at a time can occur.

data.name: OBONotExchangeableToken
data.value: OBO for '{0}' cannot exchange an application that does not have an api:// audience.
data.comment: Raised when the Azure Bot OAuth Connection is not configured to return an exchangeable token.

data.name: OBONotSupported
data.value: OBO not supported on '{0}'
data.comment: Raised when User Authorization is using a provider that does not support IOBOExchange

data.name: OBOExchangeFailed
data.value: OBO exchange failed for connection '{0}' with scopes {1}.
data.comment: Raised when an OBO exchange was attempted.

data.name: UserAuthorizationDefaultHandlerNotFound
data.value: Handler name '{0}' not found in configuration under AgentApplication:UserAuthorization:Handlers, or AgentApplication:UserAuthorization:DefaultHandlerName is invalid.
data.comment: Raised when AgentApplication:UserAuthorization:DefaultHandlerName isn't found or fails to create.
